languages.text: "Хмм... быть может, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} продемонстрирует немного милосердия... если провинившиеся черви будут просить об этом у {mf|его|ее} ног".
"Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."
languages.original_text: "Хмм... быть может, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} продемонстрирует немного милосердия... если провинившиеся черви будут просить об этом у {mf|его|ее} ног".

"Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

languages.text: “嗯……仁慈的大人或许愿意网开一面……假如那些有罪的蛆虫愿意跪在{mf|他|她}脚边，乞求宽恕。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……仁慈的大人或许愿意网开一面……假如那些有罪的蛆虫愿意跪在{mf|他|她}脚边，乞求宽恕。”

languages.text: «Hum... Tal vez {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial estaría {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a mostrar clemencia... si los gusanos culpables se postran a sus pies y suplican por sus vidas».
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

traits.locale_text: «Hum... Tal vez {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial estaría {mf|dispuesto|dispuesta} a mostrar clemencia... si los gusanos culpables se postran a sus pies y suplican por sus vidas».

languages.text: "Hımm... Belki Semavi {mf|Lordunuz|Leydiniz}, merhamet göstermeye istekli olabilir... Suçlu solucanlar ayaklarına kapanıp yalvarırsa tabii."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

traits.locale_text: "Hımm... Belki Semavi {mf|Lordunuz|Leydiniz}, merhamet göstermeye istekli olabilir... Suçlu solucanlar ayaklarına kapanıp yalvarırsa tabii."

languages.text: 「ふむ…もし、罪深い虫けらどもが足下に跪けば、もしかしたら、天の{mf|君|姫}は慈悲をかけるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ…もし、罪深い虫けらどもが足下に跪けば、もしかしたら、天の{mf|君|姫}は慈悲をかけるかもしれない」

languages.text: « Hum... Votre Céleste Seigneurie serait peut-être disposée à faire preuve de clémence... à condition toutefois que les coupables se prosternent à ses pieds pour implorer grâce. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."

traits.locale_text: « Hum... Votre Céleste Seigneurie serait peut-être disposée à faire preuve de clémence... à condition toutefois que les coupables se prosternent à ses pieds pour implorer grâce. »

languages.text: "Hmm ... Vielleicht wäre {mf|Euer himmlischer Herr|Eure himmlische Herrin} bereit, Gnade zu zeigen ... wenn die schuldigen Würmer vor {mf|seinen|ihren} Füßen um Vergebung flehen."
languages.original_text: "Hmm... Perhaps your Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} would be willing to show mercy... if the guilty worms begged for it at {mf|his|her} feet."
